February 23, 2017 4:34 pm Beyonc√© drops out of Coachella 2017 performance, Twitter goes nuts By Katie Scott National Online Journalist, Smart Living & Entertainment Global News 
Beyonce poses in the press room at the 59th GRAMMY Awards at Staples Center on February 12, 2017 in Los Angeles, California. Jason LaVeris/FilmMagic What is this?

The pop star is pregnant with twins and her label, Parkwood Entertainment, and festival producer Goldenvoice released a statement that said the Formation singer had to pull out of the famed festival under doctor‚Äôs orders. 
‚ÄúFollowing the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyonc√© has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival,‚Äù the statement said. ‚ÄúHowever, Goldenvoice and Parkwood are pleased to confirm that she will be a headliner at the 2018 festival. Thank you for your understanding.‚Äù 
READ MORE: Beyonc√©‚Äôs pregnant, and the internet nearly lost its collective mind 
She was set to headline the Saturday nights of the upcoming festival and it is currently unclear who will replace her. 
People on Twitter were very disappointed with the news of the cancellation, with many wanting to sell their festival tickets. Who wants my coachella tickets cause I ain't going anymore üôÉ pic.twitter.com/q1a0Ld2ZUo
